definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)
glove compartment (of a car)/glovebox (sealed compartment with attached gloves for handling hazardous materials etc)

sentences.english: Use rubendr gloves to wash dishes.
S36/37Wear suitable protective clothing and gloves.
sentences.chinese: 穿戴適當的防護服和手套。

sentences.english: I can't feel anything through these gloves.
sentences.chinese: 我戴著手套什麼都摸不出來。

sentences.english: Let the traffic policemen wear black cotton gloves.
Nurse, get him a gown and gloves.
sentences.chinese: 護士，給他拿套手術服和手套。

sentences.english: The burglars wore rubber gloves to guard against fingerprints.
sentences.chinese: 盜賊戴著橡皮手套以防留下指紋印。

sentences.english: Wear rubber gloves when handling cat litter.
sentences.chinese: 清理貓砂時要帶戴上橡膠手套。

sentences.english: The southpaw needed a special glove.
sentences.chinese: 這個左撇子需要特製的手套。

sentences.english: I put on my safety helmet and the glove, and sat on my silver-white colored bike.
sentences.chinese: 我帶上安全帽和手套，帥氣的跨上我的銀白色鐵馬。

sentences.english: Pet owners should handle with gloves, a mask and consult veterinarians .
sentences.chinese: 照顧生病的動物時應戴上手套及口罩，或獸醫請教。

sentences.english: The gloves are made of lambswool which means that they won’t scratch your display.
sentences.chinese: 此手套用羔羊毛製作，所以不會劃傷顯示屏。

sentences.english: Also select a comfortable pair of gloves to keep your hands and fingernails soft and chap-free.
sentences.chinese: 挑一雙溫暖的手套，保持手部皮膚柔軟避免皸裂。

sentences.english: Mittens are a better choice on colder days because your fingers will share their body heat.
sentences.chinese: 連指手套可以更好的幫助手指和身體一體保暖。

sentences.english: I also have a hat, a scarf and mittens.
sentences.chinese: 我還戴着帽子，圍巾和連指手套。
